title: Prevalence Estimates for Pemphigus in the United States: A Sex- and Age-Adjusted Population Analysis.
abstract: This cross-sectional analysis using Explorys data examines the prevalence of pemphigus in US adults across age, sex, and race groups.

authors.name: Sara Wertenteil
affiliations: Department of Dermatology, Donald and Barbara Zucker School of Medicine at Hofstra/Northwell, New Hyde Park, New York.
